title: Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | SB 1.7.9 | 12-12-2021
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: ओम अज्ञानति मिरान्दस्य ज्ञानान्जनिशलाकया चक्षुरुन्मीलितं येनातस्मै श्री गुरवे नमः
नमा ओम विश्णु पाधाया कृष्ण प्रेष्ठाय भूतले श्रीमते भक्ति वेदान्त स्वामिन्नितिनामिने
नमस्ते सारस्वते देवे गौरवाणी प्रचारिने निर्विशेश शुन्यवादी पाश्चात्य देशतारिने
जाय श्री कृष्ण चैतन्या प्रभू नित्यानंदा श्री अद्वैत गदाधर श्रीवासादी गौरवक्त वृंदा
हरे कृष्ण हरे कृष्ण कृष्ण कृष्ण हरे हरे हरे राम हरे रामा रामा रामा हरे हरे
ओम नमो भगवते वासु देवाया नारायणम नमस्कृत्या नरम चेवन अरोत्तमम देवीम सरस्वतीम व्यासम ततो जयमुदी रयेत
In this session we will be discussing from the 9th verse of the 7th chapter of the 1st canto of Shreemad Bhagavatam
शाउनकव वाच
Now after सूतकव स्वामी said that व्यास देवा taught the Shreemad Bhagavatam to his own son
Immediately शाउनकव interrupts सूतकव स्वामी and asks a very very important question
Kindly hear this question very attentively
शाउनकव वाच
सवै निवृत्ति निरतहा
सर्वत्रो पेक्षको मुनिही
कस्यवा ब्रहतीम एताम
आत्मा रामस समभ्यसत
The meaning is
Shri Shounaka asked
सूतकव स्वामी
Shri Shukadev Goswami
was already on the path of self-realization
and thus he was pleased with his own self
आत्मा रामा
Why did he
take the trouble
to undergo the self-realization
the study of such a vast literature
भागवत्म is no small literature
18,000 verses
Why did he undergo the trouble
when he was already
on the path of self-realization
So in the पर्पोर्ट्स
शिला प्रभपार explains
For the people in general
the highest perfection of life
is to cease from material activities
and be fixed on the path of self-realization
फहा कि first
काथवित है कि
Cease for material activity means
that this material activities are
activities which are aimed
at sense gratification
The sense gratification means
the senses are always demanding
some pleasure
some pleasing object
of the senses
for the eyes it is a beautiful form
for the ears it is some melodious music
or some praise
For the tongue it is some palliative beauty
For the tongue it is some palliative beauty
For the tongue it is some palliative beauty
For the tongue it is some palliative beauty
फूड लाइंड आप सेंसेस आट डिमांडिंग एंड जनरली पीपर सिंपली आर इंगेज्ड इन सैटिस्फाइंग डिमांड
सेंसेस बट संबड़ी हूं अंडेस्टेंट्स थे थ्यूमन लाइफ थे इस एन ऑपर्ट्यूनिटी फॉर परफेक्टिंग
वर्सेल्व्स पाइट गिविंग आप इस बिसनेस आफ सिंपली सैटिस्फाइंग दिस सेंसेस एंड इंस्टेड इंगेज्ड इन एक्टिविटीज ऑफ सेल्फ
रियलाइजेशन दिन देव वांट टू स्टॉप ऑल दिस सेंस ग्राटिफिकेशन बिसनेस एंड बिकम एंगेज्ड इन सेल्फ रियलाइजेशन
अचिनिस में फिल्मेंड करें ओर फिर स्टह किन्न प्लेशर ने इन सेंस एंड ग्राइन्ड है और दोस्तों वह अरफेक्शन मटिविल वेलस्पेर बर्कॉन्ड करमी
जो अपना सर
टेक्निकल टर्म प्लीज अंडर्स्टांड इस कर्मी मीन्स वन उस सिंपली इंटरेस्टेड इन मेटीरियल सेंस एंजॉयमेंट
एंड दे आर सिंपली टेंडिंग टू द नीचे विद बॉडी वे वांट टो मेंटेंड बॉडी एंड हेल्दी कंडीशन किप इट
लीन किप इट इन हेल्दी कंडीशन सिंपली बिकॉस एट एनेबल्स टेम टो एंगेज इन सेंस प्लेशर्स न आउट आउट थाउसंस एंड
नियुक्त लेरो पेर्सनं में बिकॉस एन आत्मा रामा बैसेल्फ विलाइजेशन अश्रिम विर्ड्यू वर्क पथ संरे पेर्सनं अंडेटेक्स इस
अपने लिए लिएजेशन हैं एंड बिकॉस सगस्त फौ इन एक्सपेडियन सेंग प्लेशर विदिन प्लेशर ऑफ

is trying to explain what is the need for shukadeva goswami to undertake study of this
vast literature when he was already self-satisfied what is the impetus so
srila prabhupada
says atma rama's are indifferent to material enjoyment they are not interested material
enjoyment srila shukadeva goswami had already attained that stage what stage the stage of atma
rama taking pleasure in the self or the soul and still he was attracted to undergo the trouble of
studying the great bhagavatam literature so there is an important conclusion here from this stage
that srimad bhagavatam is stronglyуетing the atma rama's behavior.
this means that shrima bhagavatam is a post-graduate study even for the atmarama's who have to

stuff so why would they study bhagavatam because bhagavatam has got nothing to do with material
sense enjoyment it's completely transcendentalized the atma vas or say the atma vow has nothing to do with
the material sense of knowledge the atma bhas not been interested in Padm Prim mommy or dealt with
any material 3000 years ago by the Lebensberger brothers and sisters who have been studied as cousins
so that is anotherrowal to Srimad bhagavatam i am sorry , with that let me we are pretty much she nugget now
called the third Mahajantik tathik Ekamika the philosophy was that Lily honest to her ego essentially
completely transcendental and not only that it is transcendental it is not merely a transcendental
literature which will award liberation those who are already liberated again they won't take
interest in some literature which describes how you can get liberation that is the
Vedanta philosophy Vedanta philosophy is meant for people who want to get out of material bondage
and put an end to the repetition of birth and death and thereby put an end to all material miseries
by becoming liberated by following the process of self-realization as described in the
Vedanta philosophy or Vedanta literature
but Shukadeva Goswami
is already liberated so Shukadeva Goswami will be neither interested in material sense enjoyment
nor will he be interested in that literature which describes how to get liberation both these
kinds of literature are not meant for persons like Shukadeva Goswami so therefore somebody who is
already liberated
is not interested in certainly not interested in any material
enjoyment or material sense pleasures and certainly not also interested in literature which teaches how you can get liberation
then what kind of literature will such a person study that is described here as Srimad Bhagavatam
that's why Srila Prabhupada uses the term
Srimad Bhagavatam is described as Srimad Bhagavatam.
श्रीमान भागवत्म का एक पोज़ ग्राज्यूएट प्यारचन्य पर करता है।
अगर आत्मा रमा्स को इतना प्रार्टिकल एकत्मिक भ्राहारों दिथाते है ,
जिनेकिन जितस्तेर हैं कई और भागवत्म को भी जुड़ करना है ,
पूर्व सो भागवतम कंटेंज ए ट्रांसेंडेंटल है फिन इस विच इस आफ डिफरेंट वराइटी दांड आ है पिनेस फिलिबरेशन
कि सो दिस इस एक्सप्लेंट इन द भक्ति रसामृत सिंधु कि जैनरली पीपल नोट टू काइंज अप हैपिनेस मेटीरियल हैपिनेस एंड स्पिरिचुअल हैपिनेस इन ओवर्ड बाग नेक्टर ऑफ डिवोशन और भक्ति
रसामृत सिंधु से हुआ है कि इससे है इस था यह त्री काइंज अप हैपिनेस मेटीरियल हैपिनेस एंड स्पिरिचुअल हैपिनेस और तू काइंज
हैपिनेस विशेष एंड ऑफ रिस्कुप्ट चिप्ट इस बट तेंशन बट पे लिटरेचर से यह जैसे थर्ड काइंड आपने स्कूल
प्लेमोशनल हैपिनेस इसे न्यूटर्म यू माइट बी गेरिंग व्हाट इसलाइज डेवोशनल हैपिनेस मेटीरियल हैपिनेस
ग्रास व सटल आल अफ इस है विक्स पीएंस इन अफ एक्सपीजन्स व इस मैटीरियल है तो वॉट इस प्रिचल है पिनेस देड़ इस द प्लेशर ऑफ दी लिबरेशन फ्रॉम मैटीरियल बॉंडेज रियलाइजिंग
प्रिट सोल आई एम नॉट दिस बॉडी एंड आज पिरिट सोल आई एम कंस्टिट्यूशनली सच्चिदानंद आई एटर्नल आई एम फुल आफ खांचिसनेस आई एम आलसो एंटाइटल टू द नैचुरल प्लेशर ऑफ द स्पिरिट ऑफ स्पिरिट्यूअल हैपिनेस वि
डिड्यॉ benefici स्पिरिचूल फिर चोली हैपी जब डिड द ओरिजिउनल नीचर सोड इस कैपिनेस पूरी चुल हैपिनेस पार फार फार फार फार क्लिटर फैन एनी मेटीअरियल हैपीनेस

and service
devotional service so that is billions and trillions of times more than any spiritual

are so many examples given in the bhagavatam how different great devotees pure devotees they

and such pure devotees who experience devotional happiness they deride even the conception of

and I'm experiencing devotional happiness I don't care for liberation but liberation comes and waits
as my maid servant how can I serve so this is the position of a pure devotee that a pure devotee is
uninterested in liberation certainly a pure devotee is never interested in any material happiness a
pure devotee is not even interested in any kind of liberation there are five kinds of liberation
but a pure devotee is not interested in any of the kinds of liberation
he is simply interested in serving Krishna because that is the source of unlimited
transcendental bliss called the devotional happiness so bhagavatam is filled with that
simply by sitting and hearing Srimad Bhagavatam from the proper source one has access to this
devotional happiness we get a glimpse of that when we begin Sankirtana
in Sankirtana there is some kind of experience of happiness which one has never experienced before
and that is very very very unique but that is only a brief glimpse we get in the beginning of our
Krishna Consciousness we have to cleanse our heart and become fixed up in devotional service to be
able to experience real devotional happiness I'll stop here thank you very much Hare Krishna
